content.College Info: Indian Institute of Technology Jammu, established in 2016, is a premier government institution located in Jagti, Jammu. As part of the prestigious IIT system, it offers world-class engineering and technology programs. The institute is known for its cutting-edge research facilities, experienced faculty, and strong industry partnerships. IIT Jammu provides undergraduate B.Tech programs in Computer Science, Mechanical, Chemical, Materials, and Electrical Engineering. The campus features modern infrastructure including smart classrooms, advanced laboratories, and comprehensive library resources.
content.Courses:
Courses Offered

  • B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering
  • B.Tech Electrical Engineering
  • B.Tech Mechanical Engineering
  • B.Tech Civil Engineering
  • B.Tech Chemical Engineering
  • B.Tech Materials Engineering
  • B.Tech Mathematics and Computing
  • B.Tech Engineering Physics
  • M.Tech VLSI Design
  • M.Tech Tunnel Engineering
  • M.Tech Thermal and Energy Systems
  • M.Tech Communications and Signal Processing
  • M.Tech Data Science
  • M.Tech Information Security
  • M.Tech Computer Technology
  • M.Sc Physics
  • M.Sc Chemistry
  • Ph.D Engineering and Sciences
content.Fees:
Fee Structure

B.Tech Program

Total Fees: ₹8.30 Lakhs for 4 years

Per Semester: ₹1.04 Lakhs

M.Tech Program

Total Fees: ₹1.03 Lakhs for 2 years

Tuition Fee: ₹80,000

M.Sc Program

Total Fees: ₹49,300 for 2 years
